185a4(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs dpa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang / bla na med pa yang dag dpar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// da ltar
185a5(nyi khri): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma ste nga dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dang / par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba
185a6(nyi khri): ji snyed cig bzhugs pa de dag gis kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung bstan te/ des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bdag ni snyoms
185a7(nyi khri): par zhugs so zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba yang med do// bdag ni snyems par 'jug go// bdag gis mnyam par gzhug par bya'o// bdag ni mnyam par
185a8(nyi khri): gzhag par gyur to zhes rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de/ de la rnam par rtog pa de dag med cing mi rgyu'o// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
185b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan pa yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan/ 
185b2(nyi khri): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bud ni reng ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan
185b3(nyi khri): zhes bya ba med kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa'o// byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to// smras
185b4(nyi khri): bang ldan parlab 'byong gra te/ de lta shing po dzin kya / nal/ byang chub sems dpa'ang gzhan zhes bya ba med / byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la/ 
185b5(nyi khri): kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems/ dbu'/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin
185b6(nyi khri): yin na/ de la ting nge 'dzin bstan pa nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ni ma yin no// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin
185b7(nyi khri): de la 'du shes su byed dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'du shes su byed pa med do// smras pa ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyur/ 
185b8(nyi khri): rab 'byor gyis smras pa rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ de la ji ltar rtog pa med pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad mang po'i phyir rtog pa med de/ de ltar
186a1(nyi khri): na ting nge 'dzin de la rtog pa med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rnam par shes par byed pa med do// 'du shes
186a2(nyi khri): su byed pa med do// smras pa ci'i phyir rna mar bre lnga byed pa med cing 'du shes su 'gyur ba med// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ting nge 'dzin de yang med la byang chub sems dpa' sems
186a3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po de yang med pa'i phyir/ rnam par shes pa med do// 'dun shes su 'gyur ba med do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs se legs so
186a4(nyi khri): zhes bya ba gnang ste/ rab 'byor legs so legs so// tshig 'di ni legs par bshad do// ji ltar ngas nyon mo/ dngas pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa'i nyan thos kyi nang na mchog
186a5(nyi khri): tu bshad pa des bshad pa ni 'di yin no// byang chub sem sa dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// bsam gtan
186a6(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab pa
186a7(nyi khri): bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar lnga mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bslab par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
186a8(nyi khri): ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs
186b1(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin
186b2(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob
186b3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa
186b4(nyi khri): yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'a/ grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol/ phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
186b5(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mi dmigs
186b6(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no// shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu
186b7(nyi khri): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so// sems can dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed
186b8(nyi khri): pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel
187a1(nyi khri): par 'byung ba mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 
187a2(nyi khri): mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
187a3(nyi khri): phyir/ gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
187a4(nyi khri): rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par
187a5(nyi khri): thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam
187a6(nyi khri): dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams
187a7(nyi khri): pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par
187a8(nyi khri): dag pa'i phyir/ lan gcig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'
187b1(nyi khri): mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas mi dmigs so// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa
187b2(nyi khri): grang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bga'astsal pa/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang / mi 'gog pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa red pa drang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang/ 
187b3(nyi khri): bamed pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'dzin/ rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ shA ra dwa ti'i phreng lta na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
187b4(nyi khri): thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no// gsol dpa bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dadapa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dang gang la slob pa
187b5(nyi khri): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems pa pa' chen po ni gang la yang slob pa meng ngo // de ci'i phyir
187b6(nyi khri): zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu chos 'di dag ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bos ji ltar mngon par chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par yod pa ma yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'o na/ chos
187b7(nyi khri): 'di dag rnam pa gang gis mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir med ces bya'o// gsol pa/ 
187b8(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ mchis pa ma lags pa la ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos
188a1(nyi khri): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo
188a2(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi chos
188a3(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no// de la byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams med pa la mngon par zhen pas
188a4(nyi khri): sred pa la mngon par zhen te/ de dag gis med pa yongs su brtags pas/ med pa la mngon par zhen cing 'di lta ste// chad pa dang rtag pa'i mtha' gnyis la chags pas// de dag
188a5(nyi khri): mi shes mi mthong ste/ gang med pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags nas/ ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa de dag/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen cing // 
188a6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la mngon par zhen to// de dag de ltar mngon par zhen pas yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la yongs su rtog ste/ de dag mi shes mi mthong ngo // ci mi
188a7(nyi khri): shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // skye mched dang / khams dang / 
188a8(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi shes mi mthong ngo // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mo shes mi mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis du mi shes mi mthong ngo // 
188b1(nyi khri): de de dag na byis pa zhes bya bya'i grangasas 'do ste/ de dag 'byung bam yin no// ga nas 'byung ba ma yin nen/ 'dod thamams sa 'byu ba sa yin no// gzugs
188b2(nyi khri): mas nas 'thung bam yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams nas 'byung ba ma yin no// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis nas 'byung ba ma yin no// de dag ni yid mchis pa / 
188b3(nyi khri): ling mi ches zhen/ gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mi chis so// byang chub kyi nga du byang chub kyis stong zhes bya bar yid mchis so// de dag ni gnas pa ma yin pa ste/ dz+haik+Sha/ 
188b4(nyi khri): gnas pa ma yin zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa jugs sa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
188b5(nyi khri): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes bkyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ phyi ldog pa'i sa lo gnas pa ma yin// sangs rgyas kyi chos
188b6(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la gnas pa ma yin no// de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin te/ ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du
188b7(nyi khri): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 
188b8(nyi khri): skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lta bar gyur pa
189a1(nyi khri): rnams la mngon pa zhen pa yin/ byang chub kyi bar la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir nu byis pa zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob
189a2(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
189a3(nyi khri): stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin/ 
189a4(nyi khri): noT gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du byang chub se/ mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol ra tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
189a5(nyi khri): pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ba ka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pas
189a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
189a7(nyi khri): dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags shing mngon par zhen/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang
189a8(nyi khri): dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan
189b1(nyi khri): brgyad pa la rtags shing mngon par zhen/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
189b2(nyi khri): dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes
189b3(nyi khri): ba rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi/ 
189b4(nyi khri): dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dbartags shing mngon par zhen/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la brtags shing mngon par zhen
189b5(nyi khri): pas/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu rnam grangs des na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams
189b6(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam pa gang
189b7(nyi khri): gis slob par 'gyur ba lags/ ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam
189b8(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing / shA
190a1(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ 
190a2(nyi khri): 'byung ba yin no// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin
190a3(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams
190a4(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid de mi dmigs yang dag par rjes su mi ma thong zhing / shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob pa ni/ 
190a5(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen/ pa nyid du 'byung ngo // shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems da/ pa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
190a6(nyi khri): spyod pa dang / de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gang ming rigs
190a7(nyi khri): po'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nang stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong
190a8(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar shes par bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u drug pa'o// 
190b1(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing / ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
190b2(nyi khri): la bslab shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji
190b3(nyi khri): skad du bstan pa bgyi/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
190b4(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyurama?/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi
190b5(nyi khri): par la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sang / sa rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing / 
190b6(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ 
190b7(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta bas na/ de khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gzugs kyang
190b8(nyi khri): gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol
191a1(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de lta bu ma lag so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin
191a2(nyi khri): snyam 'am/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ sgra
191a3(nyi khri): dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna
191a4(nyi khri): ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes rapa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma
191a5(nyi khri): yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i
191a6(nyi khri): dus te gang dang lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma
191a7(nyi khri): yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus
191a8(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma
191b1(nyi khri): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la/ sgyum yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ 
191b2(nyi khri): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan
191b3(nyi khri): la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan
191b4(nyi khri): la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam 'am/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldadan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyum yang
191b5(nyi khri): gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par
191b6(nyi khri): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu
191b7(nyi khri): ma yang gzhan ma legs te/ mig nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig go/ bcom ldan 'das rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan ma lags/ skye
191b8(nyi khri): ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ yid nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid do// bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs
192a1(nyi khri): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so// bcom ldan 'das sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg dang / chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma
192a2(nyi khri): lags te/ chos nyid kyang sgra mi sgyu ma nyid kyang chos so// bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi rnam par
192a3(nyi khri): shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa
192a4(nyi khri): dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam pa ru shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu
192a5(nyi khri): ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ mig gi 'dus te rig
192a6(nyi khri): bu nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sdigag 'dus te reg pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus
192a7(nyi khri): te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg
192a8(nyi khri): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma legs te/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshong po nyid
192b1(nyi khri): sgyu masgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / 
192b2(nyi khri): lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba 'ang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma
192b3(nyi khri): gzhan ma lags te/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang sbrum/ sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyog
192b4(nyi khri): kyichos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan ma legs/ sbrus yang gzhan mi lags te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyichos nyid kyang sgyum/ sgyum nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs
192b5(nyi khri): chos rnams so// bcom ldan 'asusangs rgyas gyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gnon ma lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos
192b6(nyi khri): ma 'dres pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi bar yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags te/ byung
192b7(nyi khri): chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa yod dam/ gsol
192b8(nyi khri): pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mi mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ 
193a1(nyi khri): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa ra
193a2(nyi khri): pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa rnam par byang ba med de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ 
193a3(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyuraro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems// 
193a4(nyi khri): nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes pa dang / brda' dang / rtags dang / tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ 
193a5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam dus// mas/ 'du shes dang / brda' dang / rtags dang / 
193a6(nyi khri): tha snyad tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po/ skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang bar dmigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom
193a7(nyi khri): ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes med cing brda' med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang / tha
193a8(nyi khri): skad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / ngag gi las med pa dang / yid med pa/ 
193b1(nyi khri): dang yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs
193b2(nyi khri): shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur// bcom
193b3(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ rnam pa
193b4(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ngo // rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid thob par 'gyuraro// gsol pa bcom da ldan 'das de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob
193b5(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ sgyu ma 'i skyes bus bslabs pa ltar bla med pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i
193b6(nyi khri): slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di lta ste/ phung po lnga po de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba sha stag go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji
193b7(nyi khri): snyam du sems/ rmi lam lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa
193b8(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyuraro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de 'di ltar phung po lnga po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis
194a1(nyi khri): / pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems kyilam lta bu'i phung pong dag/ shes
194a2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsrungs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyuraro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
194a3(nyi khri): 'das de ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de
194a4(nyi khri): ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma lta bu dang / sgra brnyan lta bu dang / dmig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / smig rgyu da lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu'i phung po lnga de dag/ shes rab
194a5(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das da ni mi 'gyuraro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
194a6(nyi khri): ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar sgyu ma ni ngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhi// sgra brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ mig yor ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ chu zla ni dngos po ma mchis
194a7(nyi khri): pa'i rang bzhin/ smig rgyu ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sprul pa ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de ni dmigasu ma mchis so// / 
194a8(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni rmi lam lta bu tshor ba ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du shes ni rmi lam lta bu/ 'du byed ni rmi lam lta bu// 
194b1(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
194b2(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dri ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni sgra brnyan lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 
194b3(nyi khri): 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sgra brnyan lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni mig yor/ 
194b4(nyi khri): lta bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam pa ru shes pa ni mig yor lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor
194b5(nyi khri): gzugs ni chu zla lta bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'dubyed dang / rnam par she ba ni chu zla lta bu ste/ rnam pa ra shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po
194b6(nyi khri): lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni smig rgyu lta bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni smig rgyu lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni dbang po
194b7(nyi khri): drug go/ de ni phung po lnga'o// rab 'byor gzugs ni sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni sprul pa lta bu ste/ rnam par shes pa
194b8(nyi khri): gang yin pa de ni dbang po drug go// de ni phung po lnga'o// de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir mi dmigs so// gsol pa bcom
195a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das de lta lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngang pa dang / 
195a2(nyi khri): skrag par mi 'gyur lags gang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa yang
195a3(nyi khri): yin la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs kyang mi mkhas pa zhig ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi lag tu'ang ma 'ongs na/ 'jigs shing dngangs pa dang / skrag
195a4(nyi khri): par yang 'gyuraro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang/ chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan/ pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi dngangs mi skrag pa'i
195a5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la thabs mkhas pa de gong legs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
195a6(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar rtogs te de mi dmigs
195a7(nyi khri): so/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar rtogs/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems da
195a8(nyi khri): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
195b1(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtogs te/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
195b2(nyi khri): dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtogs te/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs bdag med ces bya bar
195b3(nyi khri): rtogs te/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya bar rtogs te/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad
195b4(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs ni zhes bya bar rtogs te mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang // 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa zhi
195b5(nyi khri): zhes bya bar rtogs te/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis// gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtogs te/ de mi dmig so// / 
195b6(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar rtogs te/ da mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ 
195b7(nyi khri): gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya bar rtogs te/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshon ma med ces bya bar rtogs te/ de mi
195b8(nyi khri): dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar rtogs te/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang // 
196a1(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar rtogs te/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis// gzugs
196a2(nyi khri): mngon par 'dud bya ba med ces bya bar rtogs te/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar rtogs te
196a3(nyi khri): de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar rtogs te/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
196a4(nyi khri): dang / rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar rtogs te/ de mi/ dmigs so// rab 'byor 'dri ni byang chub sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
196a5(nyi khri): pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhye
196a6(nyi khri): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tsher ba
196a7(nyi khri): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
196a8(nyi khri): bya bas/ gzugs sdug bsngal ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba'i
196b1(nyi khri): rnam pa rtogs par byed de/ demi rigs so// rnam pa mgras pa sarkyen pa nga ldan pa'i yid la byungs/ guzugs padag med pa'i rnam pa rtog par byed de/ ngom rigs/ 
196b2(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa bdog med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi darigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying
196b3(nyi khri): la bya bas/ gzugs zhi ba'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ 
196b4(nyi khri): de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid da ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs stong pa'i rnam parigs par byed/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
196b5(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa'i rnam par rtog/ sa par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs
196b6(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ 
196b7(nyi khri): dride mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du
196b8(nyi khri): shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa smon pa med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
197a1(nyi khri): gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mngo
197a2(nyi khri): par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed do/ de mi dmigs so// rnam po thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed
197a3(nyi khri): de/ de mi dmigs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed de/ de mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems
197a4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la di spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar rtog pa de 'di snyam
197a5(nyi khri): du sems te/ sems can thams cad la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam
197a6(nyi khri): par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang mtshan ma med pa dang
197a7(nyi khri): smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byeng dang / rnam par
197a8(nyi khri): shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar de/ 
197b1(nyi khri): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos bstan to snyam mo// rab 'byor 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems par/ 
197b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi dang skrag par mi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nyan
197b3(nyi khri): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang mi rtag pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs
197b4(nyi khri): rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ tshor ba dang / 2shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag/ rapa'i rnam par shes par yid la byed pa de ni mi dmigs pa'i
197b5(nyi khri): tshul gyis yid la byed do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya ba dang mi ldan pas/ gzugs gang sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / 
197b6(nyi khri): stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la
197b7(nyi khri): byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
197b8(nyi khri): ming pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par yid la byed pa de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yid la byed do// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
198a1(nyi khri): / dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyams pa med pa ste/ de yod pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi dngangs skrag par mi 'gyur// 
198a2(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / 
198a3(nyi khri): bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rnam
198a4(nyi khri): pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par rtogs par byed pa dang / bzo/ dad pa dang / mos pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sem/ das dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod
198a5(nyi khri): pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyuraro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
198a6(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ tsher
198a7(nyi khri): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go/ gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya/ 
198a8(nyi khri): ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi
198b1(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rab tu rtog go// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par she pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes byang dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / 
198b2(nyi khri): zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigaso pa'i tshul
198b3(nyi khri): gyis rab tu rtog go/ de ltar de dag la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas mi gtong zhing / brtson 'grus mi 'dor ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
198b4(nyi khri): dpa' chen po de'i 'artson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de so dubs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi dzi gros mi dang skrag par mi 'gyur// rab 'byor gzhan yang
198b5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas// gzugs
198b6(nyi khri): mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos de ma yin pa byang chub kyi dgegs su 'gyur ba
198b7(nyi khri): gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / 
198b8(nyi khri): smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba/ 
199a1(nyi khri): dang mi dge ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgrogs su 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa
199a2(nyi khri): mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba
199a3(nyi khri): dang / mngon par 'du bya de med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rtog cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dang / mi dge
199a4(nyi khri): ba de ma yin pa byang chub kyi bgegasu 'gyur ba gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa/ 'a chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ de yod
199a5(nyi khri): pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'jig sa mi dang skrag par mi 'gyur// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga
199a6(nyi khri): pa/ bam po bcu gnyis pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
199a7(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ rnam pa 'di ltar rab tu rtogs te/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
199a8(nyi khri): gzugs so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// 
199b1(nyi khri): mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig go/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis/ yid
199b2(nyi khri): stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid do// gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid
199b3(nyi khri): kyang gzugs so// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang chos so// mig gi rnam par shes
199b4(nyi khri): pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong dpa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa
199b5(nyi khri): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid
199b6(nyi khri): kyis/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
199b7(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te
199b8(nyi khri): reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
200a1(nyi khri): stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i
200a2(nyi khri): stong pa nyid kyis/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus
200a3(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi
200a4(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis/ yid/  kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi
200a5(nyi khri): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyi do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar gyi steng
200a6(nyi khri): nyid kyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi stong
200a7(nyi khri): pa nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o// rab
200a8(nyi khri): 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ 
200b1(nyi khri): babs mkhas pa'o// thabs ma ngas pa de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi dang skrag par mi 'gyur// rab 'byor gyis ga
200b2(nyi khri): pa bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na mo 'jigs mi
200b3(nyi khri): dang skrag par mi 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshe
200b4(nyi khri): gnyen ni gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmig rnas pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba ba/ thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gto/ 
200b5(nyi khri): par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya
200b6(nyi khri): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongasu
200b7(nyi khri): bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
200b8(nyi khri): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam

201b1(nyi khri): par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes

201b4(nyi khri): gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sa dmas dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i ba shes gnyen ni gang de la mig mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs

203a8(nyi khri): dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i

203b2(nyi khri): par shes pa/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes

203b6(nyi khri): gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes
203b7(nyi khri): pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par
203b8(nyi khri): shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i
204a1(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang /

204a5(nyi khri): gi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmig pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par na sa pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i
204a6(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes
204a7(nyi khri): pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par
204a8(nyi khri): shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
204b1(nyi khri): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di yi dge ba'i
204b2(nyi khri): ba shes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyin ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag
204b3(nyi khri): ces bya bar ngomo dmigs po'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rangs
204b4(nyi khri): rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dngo // de lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa
204b5(nyi khri): dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi gas pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba tham sa cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma
204b6(nyi khri): gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
204b7(nyi khri): ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa sdug
204b8(nyi khri): bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus
205a1(nyi khri): te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa bdag med ces bya
205a2(nyi khri): par dri mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i
205a3(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi
205a4(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul dgyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang // sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa
205a5(nyi khri): dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'du sa te reg pa stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ches ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mtshan
205a6(nyi khri): ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te/ 
205a7(nyi khri): reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'das te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
205a8(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi
205b1(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
205b2(nyi khri): ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mngon par 'du
205b3(nyi khri): bya ba med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg
205b4(nyi khri): pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben zhes bya ba ra de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge pa'i
205b5(nyi khri): rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi da ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor
205b6(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la mig gi 'dus te reg pa la byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
205b7(nyi khri): chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / rna
205b8(nyi khri): pa'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tsher ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung
206a1(nyi khri): pa'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
206a2(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par/ nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
206a3(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te rig pa las byung ba'i
206a4(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor da ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos
206a5(nyi khri): ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshe ra ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sa chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
206a6(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi
206a7(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba bdag med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba zhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs
206a8(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / 
206b1(nyi khri): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor bzhi zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te
206b2(nyi khri): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
206b3(nyi khri): ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba stong zhes bya
206b4(nyi khri): bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig dgi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma me/ da ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa
206b5(nyi khri): dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / l+le'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi
206b6(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mtshan ma med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi
206b7(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te
206b8(nyi khri): reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung
207a1(nyi khri): ba'i tshor ba smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces
207a2(nyi khri): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg
207a3(nyi khri): pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya bar nga mi dmigs pa'i tshul
207a4(nyi khri): gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
207a5(nyi khri): las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sku'i 'dus te reg pa las byung / ba'i tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung / ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i
207a6(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams
207a7(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byer gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
207a8(nyi khri): chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sdug bsngal
207b1(nyi khri): zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba
207b2(nyi khri): med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ 
207b3(nyi khri): chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sngar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa dang / 
207b4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces dbya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang // sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba
207b5(nyi khri): dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar
207b6(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rnam pa thams cad
207b7(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / byang chub kyi bar du bsgom pa'i phyir/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / 
207b8(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o// rab 'byor 'dzin
208a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du shes par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
208a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos na/ mi 'jigs mi dngang skrag par mi 'gyur// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
208a3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na/ 'jigs shing dngang la skrag par 'gyur zhing thabs mi/ 
208a4(nyi khri): mkhas te/ sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par lhung zhi dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su spang ba lag/ das/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
208a5(nyi khri): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa tha/ mas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par// 
208a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bas
208a7(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa
208a8(nyi khri): dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing
208b1(nyi khri): dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des rlom sems
208b2(nyi khri): su byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan
208b3(nyi khri): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par gzugs nang stong
208b4(nyi khri): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo
208b5(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes
208b6(nyi khri): paphyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang steng pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed ci
208b7(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de'ang
208b8(nyi khri): dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// mig nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa
209a1(nyi khri): zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba dang sna dang lnga dang lus dang / yid nang stong pa zhes bya ba
209a2(nyi khri): yid la byed/ yid byi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing
209a3(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs
209a4(nyi khri): la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzu dgas phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang
209a5(nyi khri): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ sgra dang dri dang ro dang / reg dang / chos nang
209a6(nyi khri): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya
209a7(nyi khri): bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
209a8(nyi khri): nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// mig gi rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong
209b1(nyi khri): pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya ba
209b2(nyi khri): yid la byeng / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam por shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa na
209b3(nyi khri): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam
209b4(nyi khri): par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmig/ 
209b5(nyi khri): phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong / pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// mig gi
209b6(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa nung stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mgo gi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed
209b7(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te rag te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus
209b8(nyi khri): te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nang steng po zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid
210a1(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhe bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing dmigs
210a2(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs
210a3(nyi khri): la/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom semasu byed do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
210a4(nyi khri): phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yi/ de la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
210a5(nyi khri): ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya ba ra yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
210a6(nyi khri): dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar
210a7(nyi khri): yid la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yid la byed cing / dmigs
210a8(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar
210b1(nyi khri): de yang dmigs/ stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// sa ga khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ 
210b2(nyi khri): sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khoms dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yang la byed/ chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / 
210b3(nyi khri): rlung gi khams dang / namakha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la
210b4(nyi khri): byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid
210b5(nyi khri): la byed/ ma rig pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la d+he/ da/ ma rig pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed// ma rig pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed
210b6(nyi khri): ma rig pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa
210b7(nyi khri): dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi phyi stong pa nyid ces bya ba yid la byed/ rga shi
210b8(nyi khri): phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid de yang
211a1(nyi khri): dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de yang dmigs la/ stong pa nyid
211a2(nyi khri): de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
211a3(nyi khri): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba med par dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams bsgom ste/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
211a4(nyi khri): pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan
211a5(nyi khri): lag dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 2/ pags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan na mas dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med
211a6(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
211a7(nyi khri): med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / 
211a8(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom ste dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag kyang dmigs la/ 
211b1(nyi khri): sa ma rgyas cos ma 'dres dade dgags rlom sems sa byed ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems pa na pa nal gyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ 
211b2(nyi khri): de ltar thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bston pa 'dri thos na/ 'jigs shong dang la skrag par 'gyuraro// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rdo lta na byang chub sems
211b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grags pos yong su zin cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'odi bos na/ 'jigs shing dang la skrag par 'gyur zhing sdig pa'i
211b4(nyi khri): grogs pa'i sug par lhung ba lags/ bcom ldan/ 'das kyis bka' ba/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs pan
211b5(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed tsang bzlog par byed pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol byin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nga
211b6(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa mos pa med par byed cing bzlog par byed pa ste/ 'di ni de
211b7(nyi khri): bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis/ 'di la bslabs par mi bya'o// mdo sde 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 
211b8(nyi khri): 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o// bzung bar mi bya'o// bcang bar mi bya'o// klag par mi bya'o// kun chub par mi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o// 'di dag ni gzhan
212a1(nyi khri): la bstan par mi bya'o zhes zer ba 'di ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan
212a2(nyi khri): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni/ 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas pa dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'/ 
212a3(nyi khri): chen po'i drung du 'ong nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug las bzlog cing mos par mi byed de/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan
212a4(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci de zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas
212a5(nyi khri): khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba
212a6(nyi khri): 'ong ngo zhes bdud kyi las mi ston/ bdud kyi nyes po mi ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i gogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor
212a7(nyi khri): gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang / 
212a8(nyi khri): dbyangs kyis bsnyad pa dang / lung bstan pa dang / tshigs su bcad pa dang / ched du brjod pa dang / gleng gzhi dang / 'di ltar 'das pa dang / skyes pa'i rabs dang // 
212b1(nyi khri): shin tu rgyas pa dang / chos rmad du byung ba dang / rtogs pa brjod pa dang / gtan la bab par ston pa dag ston to// 'grel to// rnam par 'byed do// gsal bar byed
212b2(nyi khri): don yongs su ston to zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par
212b3(nyi khri): bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig te can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu
212b4(nyi khri): khyod la ni/ byang chub kyi sems cung zad kyang med/ khyo/ da ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin/ khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
212b5(nyi khri): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer ba 'di lta/ bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi smra mi ston pa ni/ raba'o/ khyor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig
212b6(nyi khri): pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin
212b7(nyi khri): te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdagra gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba dang sna dang lce dang lus dang / yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag gam
212b8(nyi khri): bdag gis stong ngo // sgra dang dri dang ro dang rag dang / chos ni bdag gam bdag gis steng ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par
213a1(nyi khri): shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag
213a2(nyi khri): gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus
213a3(nyi khri): kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus
213a4(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen/ gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher
213a5(nyi khri): ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag gam bdag gis steng ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar du ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // tshul
213a6(nyi khri): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
213a7(nyi khri): ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du ni bdag gam bdag gi
213a8(nyi khri): stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ yang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di
213b1(nyi khri): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig te can dag rang sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du byas shing / 
213b2(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos
213b3(nyi khri): rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la ni sangs rgyas shes bya ba yang med do// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do// nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do// lho dang / nub dang / byang
213b4(nyi khri): dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang nga / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / byang chub
213b5(nyi khri): sems dpa' dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la ni sangs rgyas shes bya ba yang med do// byang / chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do// nyan thos
213b6(nyi khri): bya ba yang med do zhes zer ba 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
213b7(nyi khri): bdud sdig to can dag nyan thos kyi cha byad du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las
213b8(nyi khri): bzlog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 'dems pa dang / rjes su ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
214a1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag/ mkhan po 'am/ slob dpon gyi cha byad du
214a2(nyi khri): byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las bzlog cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
