214a3(nyi khri): la bya ba las bzlog te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams le sbyor ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs
214a4(nyi khri): rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'pha dogs pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / sman pa
214a5(nyi khri): med pa'i bar gyi chos rnams la sbyor zhing / de ltar rig sa kyi bu khyod kyis chos de dag yongs su bsgoms la nyan thos kyi sar sngon du gyis shig/ bla na med pa
214a6(nyi khri): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer bya de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i
214a7(nyi khri): grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig to can dag pa dang ma'i cha byang du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 
214a8(nyi khri): 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ de'i don du ni/ bskal pa grangs med tshad med par 'khor ba na
214b1(nyi khri): 'khor zhing / rkang lag dang mgo gcad pa tshad med pas nyon mongs pa 'gyur gyis gang la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / lan gcig phyir 'ong
214b2(nyi khri): ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du byar yod pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu'i mngon du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis
214b3(nyi khri): shig ces zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las ngag mi smra mi sten pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang
214b4(nyi khri): bdud sdig to can dag dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i
214b5(nyi khri): tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 
214b6(nyi khri): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi
214b7(nyi khri): rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa
214b8(nyi khri): dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
215a1(nyi khri): ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya
215a2(nyi khri): bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba
215a3(nyi khri): dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang // gzugs
215a4(nyi khri): mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag me/ dad pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma me dad pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du ba
215a5(nyi khri): ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang rag dang / chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal
215a6(nyi khri): ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs
215a7(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshon ma med pa
215a8(nyi khri): dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par
215b1(nyi khri): shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par rishes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / 
215b2(nyi khri): zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig
215b3(nyi khri): gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon pa
215b4(nyi khri): 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te regarapa dang / sna'i te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg
215b5(nyi khri): pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'du si te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsnga la ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / 
215b6(nyi khri): stong pa dang / mtshan mi med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dbang ben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / mig gi 'dus te
215b7(nyi khri): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa nga
215b8(nyi khri): mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i ba'i 'dus te/ 
216a1(nyi khri): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
216a2(nyi khri): rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon
216a3(nyi khri): par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / 
216a4(nyi khri): bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong po dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang // mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dbe ni zhes bya bar dmigs
216a5(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba
216a6(nyi khri): stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smin pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa de lta bu'i bdud rtsi
216a7(nyi khri): las rnams mi smra mi ston pa 'di lta bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
216a8(nyi khri): sdig pa'i grogs po dag rig par byaste/ de lta po shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong drag nyi shu lnga pa las/ le'u bdun no// 
216b1(nyi khri): de nas tshe dang ldan parab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'dzi
216b2(nyi khri): don gang lags/ dro skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i
216b3(nyi khri): tshig gi don tshig gi don med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub kyang ma skyes la sems can kyang ma skyes pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor byang chub la yang tshig med/ sems
216b4(nyi khri): can la yang tshig med pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems da pa'i tshig gi don ni/ tshig gi don med pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na na mkha' la bya'i rjes med
216b5(nyi khri): do/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig/ gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du
216b6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don meng ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// 
216b7(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ smig rgyu la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ chu zla dang / 
216b8(nyi khri): sgra bsnyen dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa lags med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi/ 
217a1(nyi khri): don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin tu byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// 
217a2(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas med do// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi da
217a3(nyi khri): dang chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'o tshig gi don med // rab 'byor 'di lta ste pa
217a4(nyi khri): nasgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la gran su med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin
217a5(nyi khri): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub su mas dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
217a6(nyi khri): na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig la gnas med do// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
217a7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la/ 
217a8(nyi khri): gnas med do// sgra dang / dri dang / r-i dang / reg dang / chos la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
217b1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// rna ba'i
217b2(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// ra
217b3(nyi khri): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ 
217b4(nyi khri): dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa lag nas med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / 
217b5(nyi khri): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chu ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
217b6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas mang
217b7(nyi khri): ngo// rno ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg
217b8(nyi khri): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi
218a1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i ma rig pa la gnas med do// 'du
218a2(nyi khri): byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba
218a3(nyi khri): dang / rga shi la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig
218a4(nyi khri): gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma de'i skyes bu'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe ngag gi don med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
218a5(nyi khri): dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'gru sa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
218a6(nyi khri): spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
218a7(nyi khri): med do// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa// bam po bcu gsum po/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes
218a8(nyi khri): bu'i nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la
218b1(nyi khri): spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
218b2(nyi khri): don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang
218b3(nyi khri): rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / 
218b4(nyi khri): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgya dang / dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 
218b5(nyi khri): dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhi na gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
218b6(nyi khri): bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
218b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom
218b8(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
219a1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs
219a2(nyi khri): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par
219a3(nyi khri): shes pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// 
219a4(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig lo gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig
219a5(nyi khri): de med po'i phyir te rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dang / 'i sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med// 
219a6(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la gnas/ 
219a7(nyi khri): med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
219a8(nyi khri): sems dpa'i tshig gi dod med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la gnas med ngo // de ci'i/ 
219b1(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ gzugs de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi
219b2(nyi khri): drin med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang // d+hi dang / re dang / reg dang / chos la gnas
219b3(nyi khri): med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
219b4(nyi khri): dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rjeg das pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas
219b5(nyi khri): med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dri med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
219b6(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na de bzhin gshegs po dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i rnam par shes
219b7(nyi khri): pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi
219b8(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don
220a1(nyi khri): med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas med
220a2(nyi khri): ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
220a3(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mang ngo // rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa
220a4(nyi khri): dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te/  reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi dus te reg pa la gnamado/ ci'i phyir nan/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa de med pa'i
220a5(nyi khri): phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab
220a6(nyi khri): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi rno ba la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
220a7(nyi khri): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
220a8(nyi khri): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba'i 'dus te reg po'i rkyen
220b1(nyi khri): gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg
220b2(nyi khri): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
220b3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
220b4(nyi khri): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ma rig pa la gnas med dro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma rig pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
220b5(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
220b6(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / 
220b7(nyi khri): srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi lo gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rga shi de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
220b8(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
221a1(nyi khri): rgyas kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas med ngo // de ci'i phyir ne na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub ses
221a2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lto ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
221a3(nyi khri): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
221a4(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shes ra bra kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de
221a5(nyi khri): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub/ sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta
221a6(nyi khri): ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi nang stong pa nyid la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nang stong pa nyid de med pa'i
221a7(nyi khri): phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor
221a8(nyi khri): 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas mang ngo // de tsal
221b1(nyi khri): phyir zhe na/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo stong pa nyid nge med pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
221b2(nyi khri): sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum
221b3(nyi khri): cu rtsa bdun dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang tshad med pa rnams dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
221b4(nyi khri): baM rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa medapa
221b5(nyi khri): dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de ban na gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
221b6(nyi khri): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa de dag med
221b7(nyi khri): pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab
221b8(nyi khri): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la 'dus byas kyi khams kyi gnas mang ngo // 'dus byas kyi khams la 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyi gnas med do// rab
222a1(nyi khri): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig don med do// rab 'byor 'di/ 
222a2(nyi khri): lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa la gnas med do// 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam por byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med par
222a3(nyi khri): 'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sem
222a4(nyi khri): dpa'i tshig gi don med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi skye ba ma mchis pa la gnas ma mchis/ gang dgi 'gag pa ma mchis pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs
222a5(nyi khri): ba ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / 'byung ma mchis pa dang / gang gi mi dmigs pa la gan
222a6(nyi khri): ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs skye ba med pa la gnas med do// gzugs 'gag pa med pa dang / gzugs ku
222a7(nyi khri): nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / gzugs rnam par byang ba med pa dang / gzugs mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / gzugs 'byung ba med pa dang / gzugs ming rig
222a8(nyi khri): pa la gnas med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa la gnas med do// rnam par shes pa 'gag pa med pa dang / rnamapa
222b1(nyi khri): shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par byang ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / rnam par shes pa 'byung
222b2(nyi khri): med pa dang / rnam par shes pa mi dmigs pa la gnas med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med pa la gnas med do// skye mched
222b3(nyi khri): dang / khams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 
222b4(nyi khri): 'byung ba med pa dang / mi dmigs pa la gnas med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar dang / 'phags dpa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams
222b5(nyi khri): dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa pa da dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'ju/ 
222b6(nyi khri): pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin
222b7(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams skye ba med pa la gnas med do// 
222b8(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung
223a1(nyi khri): med pa dang / mi dmigs pa la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ 
223a2(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
223a3(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rna bar dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
223a4(nyi khri): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ skye mched dang // ngom sa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu rnam par dag
223a5(nyi khri): pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por na sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i/ 
223a6(nyi khri): tshig gi don med do// dran pa nye bar gzhog pa'i bar du shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / 
223a7(nyi khri): stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med
223a8(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / 
223b1(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stong
223b2(nyi khri): bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med do// rab 'a
223b3(nyi khri): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag/ 
223b4(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan dma'i gnas med do// sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag
223b5(nyi khri): dang / shed can dang / shes bdag dang / byed pa/ dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/ sems can dang / srog dang / 'gro
223b6(nyi khri): ba dang / gso dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shes can dang / shes bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan
223b7(nyi khri): ma'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab
223b8(nyi khri): 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba'i tshe/ mun pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
224a1(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bsgral pa'i me 'bar ba'i tshe 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad
224a2(nyi khri): kyi gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don mang ngo // rab
224a3(nyi khri): 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du
224a4(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dadapa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 
224a5(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog sa pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la 'khrug pa'i ga nas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
224a6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi drin med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag btso/ 
224a7(nyi khri): pa yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi shes rab la shes rab 'chal pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
224a8(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
224b1(nyi khri): kyi rnam par grol ba la rnam par ma grol ba'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems
224b2(nyi khri): dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa
224b3(nyi khri): la/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mya gzigs pa'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
224b4(nyi khri): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper no// nyi ma dang / zla ba'i 'od la mun pa 'i gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
224b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu/ phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi// don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bza' dang
224b6(nyi khri): skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'od la gnas mad do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
224b7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang / 'tshe
224b8(nyi khri): ma dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs ris dang / tshangs lha nye phan dang / tshangs pa kun 'khor dang / tshangs chen dang / 'og
225a1(nyi khri): min gyi bar gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
225a2(nyi khri): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// de bzhin gshags
225a3(nyi khri): po dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od la gnas med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha
225a4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i chog gi don med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang/ chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 
225a5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa'i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i chos de/ ngag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan/ pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs med pa/ bstan tu
225a6(nyi khri): med pa/ thogs pa med pa dang / 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa sha stag ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ chos thams cad
225a7(nyi khri): kyi med pa yang dag pa nyid la bslabs par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad rigs par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad
225a8(nyi khri): ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ma mchis pa yang dag pa nyid la ji ltar bslabs par bgyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
225b1(nyi khri): chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar rig par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang / mi dge ba dang / lung bstan
225b2(nyi khri): pa dang / lung ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma
225b3(nyi khri): byas dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na mtho ba med pa dang thun mongs dang / thun mongs ma yin pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ba ste/ byang
225b4(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang chos dang dag thams cad kyi med pa nyid la slab par bya'o// byang chu/ ba sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes par bya ba
225b5(nyi khri): yang chos thams cad po de dag nyid do// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
225b6(nyi khri): 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni par shes pa/ mar shes pa/ dge sbyong du shes pa/ bram zer shes pa/ rigs kyi nu rgan pa la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las
225b7(nyi khri): byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi las kyi dngos po dang / nyams su blangs pa dang ldan pa'i
225b8(nyi khri): dngos po dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang / 'bru can gyi 'du shes dang / rnam
226a1(nyi khri): par rnag pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par sngos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par thos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam pa
226a2(nyi khri): 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa'i bzhi dang / gzugs med
226a3(nyi khri): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge
226a4(nyi khri): 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang // lus kyi
226a5(nyi khri): rnam pa rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan
226a6(nyi khri): 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di ltar rab 'byor srog gcod pa ni 'jig
226a7(nyi khri): rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / zha gcod pa dang / tshig khyal pa dang / chags
226a8(nyi khri): sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba dang / khro ba dang / mdud par 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal dang / 
226b1(nyi khri): log pa'i nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das lung ma bstan pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
226b2(nyi khri): lus kyi lus ni lung ma bstan pa'o// ngag gi las ni lung ma bstan pa'o// yid kyi las ni lung ma bsten pa'o// 'byung ba chen po bzhi ni lung ma bstan pa'o// dbang po lnga ni lung ma bstan/ 
226b3(nyi khri): pa'o// skye mched drug ni lung ma bstan pa'o// gzugs med pa bzhir skyed pa ni lung ma bstan pa'o// phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched ni lung ma bstan pa'o// rnam par smin pa
226b4(nyi khri): thams cad ni lung ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni wa rang du ma bstan pa'i chos shes par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom
226b5(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya ba ni phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang / bsam
226b6(nyi khri): gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes palta dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs pa
226b7(nyi khri): de ma yin pa 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan
226b8(nyi khri): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
227a1(nyi khri): dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid/ 
227a2(nyi khri): dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ma shes pa yongs su shes par bya ba'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes pa'i dbang po dang / yongs su shes par rtogs
227a3(nyi khri): pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med pa dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 
227a4(nyi khri): rig pa dang rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la bya ba dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs
227a5(nyi khri): dang ldan pas gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar
227a6(nyi khri): pa gnyis pa'o// sdug par mos par gyur pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par
227a7(nyi khri): gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas// rnamakha' mtha' ya so zhes te/ namakha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// 
227a8(nyi khri): de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te/ 
227b1(nyi khri): gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched
227b2(nyi khri): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes
227b3(nyi khri): med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par
227b4(nyi khri): 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa ba rgyad pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad po de dag dang / mthar
227b5(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dang / grang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de 'dod pas dben sdig te/ mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ 
227b6(nyi khri): dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang
227b7(nyi khri): yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud cig tu gyur pas/ rnam par rtog pa med la rnam par dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dgra' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la
227b8(nyi khri): nye bar bsgrub te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas so// bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis de/ 
228a1(nyi khri): la dran pa dang ldan pa/ bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa rje bsgrubs te gnas so// 
228a2(nyi khri): bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ badre ba yang meng / sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang snyoms dang dran
228a3(nyi khri): pa yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnam
228a4(nyi khri): nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam kha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrub te gnas so// 
228a5(nyi khri): de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha 'a yas so zhes// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la
228a6(nyi khri): nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar
228a7(nyi khri): bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar sgrubs te gnas so// 
228a8(nyi khri): de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de ltar mthar
228b1(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu po de dag dang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin
228b2(nyi khri): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten
228b3(nyi khri): las 'das pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa dang
228b4(nyi khri): bcas pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i
228b5(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes/ pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa
228b6(nyi khri): ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi
228b7(nyi khri): dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden
228b8(nyi khri): pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin
229a1(nyi khri): thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gang shegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jig pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
229a2(nyi khri): bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan/ 
229a3(nyi khri): 'das 'dus byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi chos shes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / 
229a4(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i khams dang / gzhan yang de ma yin pa 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos rnams/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi
229a5(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan// 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
229a6(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya ba ni gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang / gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa ste/ 'dod chags zad
229a7(nyi khri): pa/ gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid/ chos nyid chos kyi dbyings/ chos skyon med pa nyid/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyis
229a8(nyi khri): yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das thun mongs kyi chos gong lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
229b1(nyi khri): stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mong gi chos shes bya ba ni bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga dag
229b2(nyi khri): ste de dag ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams dang / thun mong gi chos shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
229b3(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor thun mongs ma yin pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi
229b4(nyi khri): par dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos shes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ rang
229b5(nyi khri): gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la rtog pa med pas chags par mi bya'o// chos thams cad gnyis sa su med pa'i tshul gyis rtog pa med cing / rnam par
229b6(nyi khri): rtog pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang 'di
229b7(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems
229b8(nyi khri): can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul byed par 'gyur ba/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// gsol pa brtso ldan 'das sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa
230a1(nyi khri): de lta bu'i phul/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyid par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can gyi phung po nges pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
230a2(nyi khri): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / 
230a3(nyi khri): phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang / phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
230a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/ rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po nges pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lta bu'i phul byed par 'gyur// de la byang chub sems
230a5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed do// / sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul zhes/ bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems
230a6(nyi khri): bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpe 'chen po 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ 'khor dpag tu med
230a7(nyi khri): par sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag go cha bgo bar bya'o// bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid
230a8(nyi khri): bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// de ltar sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang / sems
230b1(nyi khri): can gang yang yongs mya ngan las 'das pa med pas/ chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa bdag gis shes par bya'o// bdag gis ma 'dres pa'i rnam pa thams cad
230b2(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems kyis/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o// bdag gis chos rtogs pas thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba phun su tshogs pa la bslabs par bya'o// bdag gis
230b3(nyi khri): chos kyi tshul gcig tu bsgrubs par khong du chud par bya'o// bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa thams cad yong su sdu bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems/ 
230b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ dri de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems pa/ 'a chen po sems can gyi phung po chen po sa pa'i rdul mi dmig
230b5(nyi khri): pa'i tshul gyis mi byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ltar sem sa bskyed de/ sems can dmyal ba dang byol song gi skye
230b6(nyi khri): gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar gyur pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong ba de dag thams cad/ sems can/ 
230b7(nyi khri): de dag gi don du bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du sems 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis
230b8(nyi khri): sems can re re'i don du skal ba bye ba khrog khrig brgya stong mang por/ sems can gang yang phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems
231a1(nyi khri): can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag kyang / bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o zhes thabs de lta bus sems can thams cad kyi don du sems can thams cad phung po ma lus
231a2(nyi khri): pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyingasu mo su mya ngan las ma bzlas kyi bar du/ sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad kyang nyams su myong bar bya'o// de nas gdod bdag gi don du
231a3(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mar byang chub kyi tshogs mang po bsags te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar
231a4(nyi khri): bya'o snyam du sems bskrad par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyedarab rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'
231a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen pos sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor pa/ zhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rgyun
231a6(nyi khri): mi chad par rlabs po che'i sems gang gis sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems rlabs po che ba skyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sema?/ 
231a7(nyi khri): rlabs po che ni/ sems dang po bskyed phyin chad 'dod chags kyi sems mi bskyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed/ gauti mug gi sems mi skyed/ gtse ba'i sems mi skyeng / nyan thos kyi
231a8(nyi khri): sems mi skyed/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang mi skyed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o// des sems can thams cad kyi phul byed
231b1(nyi khri): kyang du sems rlabs po che des rlom sems su mi bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi bsgral ba'i sems dang ldan par bya ste/ de la byang chub sems
231b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi bsgral ba ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan par yid la byed pa des rlom sems su mi byed pa ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
231b3(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i sems mi bsgral ba'o// sems nges sems can thams cad kyi phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
231b4(nyi khri): chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i se/ mas bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems ni/ 
231b5(nyi khri): sems can thams cad skyob cing / sems can thams/ cad/ yongs su mi gtong la/ des rlom sems su 'gyur ba med pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sem/ 
231b6(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang / bde ba'i sems te/ de la gnas shing sems can gyi phung po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan/ 
231b7(nyi khri): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad pa tshe 'dod par bya'o// chos la dga' bar bya'o// chos la mos par bya'o// chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la
231b8(nyi khri): brtson par bya'o// de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams cad dbyer med pa ste/ 'di ni chos shes bya'o// de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos de la 'dod cing mos pa ste/ 'di ni chos
232a1(nyi khri): 'dod pa zhes bya'o// de la chos dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos de la dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la mos pa gang
232a2(nyi khri): zhe na/ gang chos de la yon tan du lta ba ste/ 'di ni chos la mos pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la bsgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ 
232a3(nyi khri): 'di ni chos la mos pa'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sems can gyi bung
232a4(nyi khri): po chen po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// // rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems ja' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong
232a5(nyi khri): pa nyid la gnas/ phyi stong pa nyid la gnas/ phyi nang ste/ nga ba nyid la gnas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid s+ho// nga pa nyid kyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po
232a6(nyi khri): nges pa'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas
232a7(nyi khri): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
232a8(nyi khri): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi
232b1(nyi khri): sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs
232b2(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po nges pa'i phul mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
232b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting / 
232b4(nyi khri): nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po nges pa'i phul tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'gyur bar bya'o// rab 'byor chos de dag la gnas shing byung
232b5(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol/ tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ sems can gyi phung po chen po sa lnga phul byed pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems
232b6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
232b7(nyi khri): chen po zhes bgyi ba 'di la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu de la spobs pa bskyed cig/ shA ra dwa ti'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan
232b8(nyi khri): 'das bdag tu lta ba dang / sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / 
233a1(nyi khri): tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med par lta ba dang / phung po
233a2(nyi khri): lta ba dang / khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar lta ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang / sangs
233a3(nyi khri): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu dag par bya bar lta ba dang / byang mung dulta ba dang / sa ng+yas lta dang / chos su lta ba dang / dge 'dun
233a4(nyi khri): du lta ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar lta ba rab tu spang ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams la chos ston par bgyid kyang / 
233a5(nyi khri): de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad du byang / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
233a6(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ gzugs su lta bur 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba
233a7(nyi khri): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
233a8(nyi khri): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs la dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta
233b1(nyi khri): ba bskyed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i rdul gyis lta ba bskyed // skye mje du dang / khams dang / 
233b2(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
233b3(nyi khri): dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam
233b4(nyi khri): yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i badren pa rnam das dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa/ rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug par
233b5(nyi khri): dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
233b6(nyi khri): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / 
233b7(nyi khri): so so yang dag par rig pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// yongs su/ 
233b8(nyi khri): mya ngan las 'da' ba'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su
234a1(nyi khri): lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba'in/ yongasu mya ngan las 'da' pa'i bar du/ lta ba
234a2(nyi khri): 'gyur ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir/ mi dmigs
234a3(nyi khri): bro'i tshul gyis chos ston to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das den gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'
234a4(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab byor khyod kyis spobs pa bskyed cig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol
234a5(nyi khri): pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam/ pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang rang sang sa rgyas thams cad dang thun meng ma lags pa'i sems de lta bu
234a6(nyi khri): la yang chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis sems de ni zag pa
234a7(nyi khri): ma mchis shing khongs su chud pa ma mchis pa ste/ de ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing / khams gsum gyi khongs su chud par ma mchis pa'i sems de la yang / 
234a8(nyi khri): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi slad du chags pa ma mchis pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' ni/ sems dpa' chen po'i grangs su mchi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ 
234b1(nyi khri): dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams/ 
234b2(nyi khri): cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed phyin chad chos gang
234b3(nyi khri): yang skye bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong 'gag pa dang / 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa dang / 'ong ba dang 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su/ 
234b4(nyi khri): mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gang la skye ba ma dad cing 'gag pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med cing 'gri rab med pa dang / 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas
234b5(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyis sems med do// rang sangs rgyas kyi sem sa med ngo do// byang chub sems dpa'i sems mang ngo // yang
234b6(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sems med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA rA dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang
234b7(nyi khri): sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems so// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa/ khongs su chud
234b8(nyi khri): pa med pa/ de lta bu'i sems la yang chags pa med de zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshong ldan po rab 'byor de ngas gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
235a1(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ts+tsha
235a2(nyi khri): bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med do// skye mched dang / khams dang / 
235a3(nyi khri): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang chags pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang chag/ 
235a4(nyi khri): pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyed kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems
235a5(nyi khri): de yang zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma zad de/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang / 
235a6(nyi khri): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang
235a7(nyi khri): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ de yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong
235a8(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud ba med do// nyan thos dang rong sangs rgyas kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chung ba med do// sangs
235b1(nyi khri): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de lta yin na/ gzugs kyang rang
235b2(nyi khri): bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud par med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa
235b3(nyi khri): med cing khongs su chud pa med ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// rnam pa thams
235b4(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir// zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ji skad smras pa de
235b5(nyi khri): bzhin du/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du/ shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa yang
235b6(nyi khri): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su
235b7(nyi khri): chud pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis
235b8(nyi khri): 'di skad du/ sems med pa'i phyir/ sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa ni de lta yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor der yang ma zad dang / gzugs med pa yang gzugs la
236a1(nyi khri): chags pa med do// tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa yang / rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do// / 
236a2(nyi khri): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa medo// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnas kyi bar du med pa yang/ sangs rgyas kyi rlom 'dres pa rnas la chagra pa med do// rnam pa/ 
236a3(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang / rnam pa thams cad chags pa med do// smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin no// gzugs med pa yang gzugs la chags pa
236a4(nyi khri): med do// tshor ba med pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'du byed med pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa yang dang / rnam par she med pa la chags pa med do// byang chub
236a5(nyi khri): kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du med pa yang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med do// sang sa rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du med pa yang
236a6(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la chags pa med do// tshe dang ldan pa
236a7(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems/ nyan thos dang rang sangs
236a8(nyi khri): rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang / chos thams cad la dmigs pa med pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med/ mngon par chags par 'gyur ba med pas de'i
236b1(nyi khri): phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slang
236b2(nyi khri): dubyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs pa skye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis spobs pa bskyed cig/ gang pos gsol
236b3(nyi khri): pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de ni theg pa chen po
236b4(nyi khri): la yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags pas/ de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes rangagyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ de nas tshe dang / 
236b5(nyi khri): ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa 'a sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po dgos shes bya/ gang
236b6(nyi khri): pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi don du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing
236b7(nyi khri): sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ 
236b8(nyi khri): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / tshul khrims bsrung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / tshul khrim
237a1(nyi khri): bsrung ngo // sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / bzod pa bsgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du/ 
237a2(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bzod pa bsgom mo// sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin
237a3(nyi khri): gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus brtsom mo// sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
237a4(nyi khri): phyin pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan bskyed pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du/ bsam/ gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / bsam gtan
237a5(nyi khri): bskyed do// sems can nyung zad nyi tshe'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du
237a6(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / shes rab bsgom mo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i
237a7(nyi khri): dbyis su yongs su mya ngan las bzla' bar bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla' bar mi bya'o zhe'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o// 
237a8(nyi khri): sems can 'di snyid cig ni byang chub tu dgod par mi bya'o// zhes sems can yongasu dpog pas gomam gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cang/ 
237b1(nyi khri): kyi don du go cha chen po gyon to// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar
237b2(nyi khri): bya'o// bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab
237b3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs
237b4(nyi khri): kyi chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang // bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la gnas
237b5(nyi khri): par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang gzugs med pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa la sbyar bar bya'o// bdag kyang rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i
237b6(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / 
237b7(nyi khri): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o// sems
237b8(nyi khri): can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskrad de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
238a1(nyi khri): dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa bam po bcu bzhi pa/ tshe dang
238a2(nyi khri): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong ba de dag nyan thos dang rang sangs
238a3(nyi khri): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad
238a4(nyi khri): dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog/ sa pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub se/ dmas dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
238a5(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa gang yongasu gtong ba'i sprin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA/ radwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
238a6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongasu gtong zhing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i don du yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub
238a7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing // sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
238a8(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang / brten pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
238b1(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yong su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
238b2(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
238b3(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
238b4(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba'i tshe/ 'di lta rar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid dal bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / de la
238b5(nyi khri): dmigs pa gcig pas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa 'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
238b6(nyi khri): rol tu phyin la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongasu gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
238b7(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sbyin pa yongasu spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas
238b8(nyi khri): te/ sbyin pa yang mi dmigs/ gtong ba yang mi dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 
239a1(nyi khri): sbyin pa yong su gtong ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
239a2(nyi khri): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
239a3(nyi khri): pa'i go cha chen po bgos par shes par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams
239a4(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa/ gang yongasu gtong ba de dag sems can thams cad dang / na mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
239a5(nyi khri): byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
239a6(nyi khri): phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
239a7(nyi khri): pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la yang mos pa mi skyed na/ so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta ci smos pa 'od ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol
239a8(nyi khri): tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ljon pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
239b1(nyi khri): ldan pa'i yid la byangs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang brten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims kyi pha
239b2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
239b3(nyi khri): yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
239b4(nyi khri): spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang nga ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang/ ra' sems dpa' chen po// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
239b5(nyi khri): ldan pa'i yid la bya bas// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems kyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang
239b6(nyi khri): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshul khrims
239b7(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang rang sangs
239b8(nyi khri): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad
240a1(nyi khri): sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas shing / tshul khrims des rlom sems su mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshul khrims de yang mi dmigs shing
240a2(nyi khri): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
240a3(nyi khri): chen po/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi ba tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
240a4(nyi khri): pa de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongasu 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
240a5(nyi khri): sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
240a6(nyi khri): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongasu gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
240a7(nyi khri): bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
240a8(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang rgya so dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
