240b1(nyi khri): yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yongasu bsrungs zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba 'di/ 
240b2(nyi khri): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
240b3(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / brten pa
240b4(nyi khri): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa/ de'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// dang ldan par shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
240b5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thA/ mas cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod
240b6(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha
240b7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa
240b8(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
241a1(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan
241a2(nyi khri): thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos
241a3(nyi khri): thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing / bzod pa mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
241a4(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu
241a5(nyi khri): phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po tha ma/ sa cad yongasu 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgo/ sa shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
241a6(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
241a7(nyi khri): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongasu gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
241a8(nyi khri): chub tu yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang
241b1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sngon 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
241b2(nyi khri): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims bsrung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
241b3(nyi khri): tu yongasu bsngo ba 'dri ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
241b4(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
241b5(nyi khri): pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
241b6(nyi khri): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos
241b7(nyi khri): dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems
241b8(nyi khri): can thams cad kyi don du/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing / brtun mi nges pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
242a1(nyi khri): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan
242a2(nyi khri): pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
242a3(nyi khri): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang rang / 
242a4(nyi khri): sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid lo bya bas ma yin gyi/ rna dam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya/ de bas/ chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar
242a5(nyi khri): gnas te/ brtson 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed kyi / brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'o rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas
242a6(nyi khri): shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i shes rab kyi pha
242a7(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa ra shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drag po thang
242a8(nyi khri): yongasu 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
242b1(nyi khri): spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ sbyin pa yongasu gtong zhing / dge ba'i/ 
242b2(nyi khri): rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
242b3(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
242b4(nyi khri): la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa de'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad ma khyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims
242b5(nyi khri): bsrung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad du / 'thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba 'dra ni/ byang chub sems dpa
242b6(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
242b7(nyi khri): chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la
242b8(nyi khri): bya bas/ bzod pa yongasu bsgom ste/ dge ba'o rtsa bde yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni/ 
243a1(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i 'azod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
243a2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan
243a3(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed de/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing // bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
243a4(nyi khri): byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa
243a5(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la so do cing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
243a6(nyi khri): yid la bya ba sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa gcig pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go mi 'byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
243a7(nyi khri): yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan
243a8(nyi khri): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu
243b1(nyi khri): phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang rlom semasu mi byed cing / bsam gtan de yang mi dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa
243b2(nyi khri): bde yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam
243b3(nyi khri): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa lang
243b4(nyi khri): ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yo dang su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir ge che chen po bgos shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
243b5(nyi khri): dpa'i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams/ 
243b6(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ 'khor gsum yongasu dag pa'i sbyin pa yongasu gtong zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na
243b7(nyi khri): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
243b8(nyi khri): pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rong sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
244a1(nyi khri): yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ tshul khrims yong su bsrung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can bcwa
244a2(nyi khri): cang dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yong su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
244a3(nyi khri): spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos
244a4(nyi khri): dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yod la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa la mos
244a5(nyi khri): shing brten te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dang/ par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongasu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub
244a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
244a7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus nyams par
244a8(nyi khri): mi byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad nga thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'
244b1(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
244b2(nyi khri): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
244b3(nyi khri): bya bas/ sems rtse gcig tu byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa bde yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
244b4(nyi khri): su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' da chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skyed pa'i bas dam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
244b5(nyi khri): bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ 
244b6(nyi khri): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rlom sems su
244b7(nyi khri): mi byed de/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems
244b8(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
245a1(nyi khri): chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis/ pha rol tu phyin pa 'di dag dang / sems can dang byang chub la mtshan mar mi
245a2(nyi khri): byed/ mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi go cha chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
245a3(nyi khri): ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ pha rol tu phyin pa ru ra la gnas shing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshe dang
245a4(nyi khri): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med / dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnam
245a5(nyi khri): la yang mnyam par gzhog ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyi ro myong bar mi byed do// bsam gtan
245a6(nyi khri): dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
245a7(nyi khri): pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thabs la mkhas pa dang / 'grogs pa'o// 
245a8(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben pa
245b1(nyi khri): mthong ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa mthong bas mnyam par gzhog ste/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du'ang mi byed de/ 
245b2(nyi khri): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyang zil gyis gnon to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
245b3(nyi khri): thabs mkhas pa'i ge rdza chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shwa radwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri dwa to'i/ 
245b4(nyi khri): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar godan po 'gros pa la/ shar phyogs dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / sheng lho dang / lho
245b5(nyi khri): nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi gas re re'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye/ ma snyed drug na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs/ 
245b6(nyi khri): pa rnams kyang chang du brjod pa cha du brjod cing / ming yongs su sgrogs pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gro cha chen po
245b7(nyi khri): bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par brtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes sgrog
245b8(nyi khri): go/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la yang dag par zhugs shes bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
246a1(nyi khri): po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa dradrug la spyod do// 
246a2(nyi khri): de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / 'dod pas dben/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga'
246a3(nyi khri): ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 
246a4(nyi khri): de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu ya dngas pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs dmed pa gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs
246a5(nyi khri): pashin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyi ngas kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing
246a6(nyi khri): rnam par spyod do// dri snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gcugs
246a7(nyi khri): pa med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten/ chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ na mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu
246a8(nyi khri): rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de'i tshe tshad med pa 'di dag dang / gzugs med pa na yod pa 'di dag la/ na mkha'i rnam pa dang / tshul dang / mtshan mas
246b1(nyi khri): sa pa gzhog cing / rna bya snang ba'i mas / rnam pa grangs kyang mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su bstsob 'din/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen pa btsun pa'i yolas phyin
246b2(nyi khri): de bzhin du mu gakhrims kyi rol tu phyin pang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phrin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
246b3(nyi khri): gri pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA rA ti'i phre ltaran/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// reg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bya'o// rje dang ldan
246b4(nyi khri): shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'i sem dadapa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po// / shin tu yangs pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ 
246b5(nyi khri): gzugs med pa/ lhod pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs / shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos phyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam kha'i mama' gtugs pa'i bye
246b6(nyi khri): bcu rgyas par bka' ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btung snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems rgya chen po shin tu yangs pa/ 
246b7(nyi khri): mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ gzugs med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ lhong pa med pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas/ 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis
246b8(nyi khri): klas pa/ nam pa'i mtha' gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ mos par byas shing rnam par spyod do// de 'dod pas dben/ sdig te mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben/ 
247a1(nyi khri): rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs
247a2(nyi khri): te gnas so// de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha'
247a3(nyi khri): yas skye mched dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
247a4(nyi khri): chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sem/ das dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid// dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas/ 
247a5(nyi khri): nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i ste mas par 'jug pa de dag gzhan la brjod cing 'tshed pa dang / 
247a6(nyi khri): ston cing 'grel la/ rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed de/ de dag gi ro dang dgi skyon dang 'byung ba yang / tshul bzhin du ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
247a7(nyi khri): dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag gis bas gnadang / 
247a8(nyi khri): tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/ sems
247b1(nyi khri): bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma nyams pa'o// de ltar byang chub sems dpa'
247b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
247b3(nyi khri): 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ 'ong snyam du sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir/ chos bstan to snyam du sems shing / yid la bya ba
247b4(nyi khri): de dag la bzod pa dang / mos pa dang / rtog pa dang / sems shing khong du chud par byed pa 'dadi ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
247b5(nyi khri): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam
247b6(nyi khri): gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang / rnam
247b7(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam/ 
247b8(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge
248a1(nyi khri): 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ma ltung
248a2(nyi khri): ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad
248a3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa'i yan lag dang
248a4(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi yan lag mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag me dad pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong
248a5(nyi khri): bya'i rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par smon po med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang / bas ma gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i
248a6(nyi khri): snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing / de dag gis rlom sems med pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
248a7(nyi khri): ste tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan
248a8(nyi khri): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa
248b1(nyi khri): da / rnam pa thams cad du 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar
248b2(nyi khri): pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams
248b3(nyi khri): dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
248b4(nyi khri): bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying den po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams/ bsgom pa dang rnam pa thams cad du rnam pa thams
248b5(nyi khri): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du bsgom pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang / 
248b6(nyi khri): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs
248b7(nyi khri): su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed do// snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang / snying brtse ba'i nyams su
248b8(nyi khri): byed do// dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhog cing bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la sems so// btang snyoms
249a1(nyi khri): kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gnog cing sems can rnams kyi zag pabazad par bya ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
249a2(nyi khri): dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / 
249a3(nyi khri): tshul dang mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing / rnam par ldang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs
249a4(nyi khri): su mi bsngo ba 'di nirnga/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims da kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su ma nyams pa'o// nam
249a5(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gta/ na dang // tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa 'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis ma 'dres par rnam
249a6(nyi khri): par spyad cing / sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mos shing dga' ba 'di ni/ byang
249a7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
249a8(nyi khri): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i don du/ brtson 'grus mi btong bas rnam par
249b1(nyi khri): spyod pa 'dzin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i 'artson 'grus kyi rol tu phyin pa'o// nas byang chub sems dpa sems dpa
249b2(nyi khri): chen po bsum gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la yang mnyam par gzhog la/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs
249b3(nyi khri): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye zhing / de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang med la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub
249b4(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po tshad med pa rnams la s+ho/ dpa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ma byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po/ rnam
249b5(nyi khri): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas// bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par
249b6(nyi khri): gzhog cing / rnam par ldang la de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa'i
249b7(nyi khri): rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang // nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/ 
249b8(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen
250a1(nyi khri): po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni nang stong pa nyid shes kyang / dmigs pa'i
250a2(nyi khri): tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa ste/ 
250a3(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
250a4(nyi khri): po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par mi 'khrug cing / mnyam par gzhag/ dpa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub
250a5(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sam sa dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ rtag
250a6(nyi khri): ces bya bar she ba mi 'jug/ mi rtag pa dang / bde ba dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag dang bdag meng pa dang / sdug pa drang mi sdug ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ 
250a7(nyi khri): tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni de mi dmigs pa'i tshul du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byung
250a8(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed la/ 
250b1(nyi khri): 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi shes pa yang med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub
250b2(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ 'jig
250b3(nyi khri): rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la yang shes pa 'jug par mi byed/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma
250b4(nyi khri): byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par mi byed kyang / 'ji dag rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / 
250b5(nyi khri): zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyang mi shes pa med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di yang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul
250b6(nyi khri): du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg
250b7(nyi khri): pa chen po la gnas shes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' tshon po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 
250b8(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / des smin pa yang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub sems dpa' yang mi
251a1(nyi khri): dmigs/ len pa yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mi dmigs
251a2(nyi khri): nga'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus
251a3(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas kyang / 
251a4(nyi khri): des dge ba'i chos kyang mi dmigs/ mi dge ba'i chos dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'ongs/ pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas dang / zag
251a5(nyi khri): pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyang mi dmi gas shing shes rab kyang mi dmigasashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang mi dmigs/ byang chub
251a6(nyi khri): sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes
251a7(nyi khri): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
251a8(nyi khri): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo// rnam pa thams
251b1(nyi khri): cang sa rkyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ya gyus dres pas/ bsgom parnan par bsgos pa don du/ de'i dmigs pa sa rgyas pa snong pa nyid bsgom so/ 
251b2(nyi khri): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom mo// 
251b3(nyi khri): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ dngos po
251b4(nyi khri): med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar du bsgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sum des dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad
251b5(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
251b6(nyi khri): chos rnams bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas/ bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i
251b7(nyi khri): tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang bsem gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams da/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
251b8(nyi khri): dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgupa stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i
252a1(nyi khri): ting 'dzin bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bam 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i/ 
252a2(nyi khri): don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad
252a3(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par bsgom pa'i don du/ de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs
252a4(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bsgom mo// tshe dang
252a5(nyi khri): ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan
252a6(nyi khri): pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
252a7(nyi khri): zhes bya ba 'di ni tha snyad tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes so// gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ gzugs shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// tshor ba dang / 'du
252a8(nyi khri): shes/ 'du byed dang / rnam pa po shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam pa po shes pa zhes bya ba 'don ming tsam du zang do// skye mched dang / khams
252b1(nyi khri): dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zang ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i
252b2(nyi khri): phyir/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zung ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
252b3(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam
252b4(nyi khri): du zad do// nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ nang steng pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi steng
252b5(nyi khri): pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// phyi nang stong / pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ phyi nang stong / pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// dngos po
252b6(nyi khri): pa'i te smos nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni mang tsam du zad do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams su
252b7(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bas gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang // 
252b8(nyi khri): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa rnams dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / 
253a1(nyi khri): mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa dang mngon par shes pa rnams dang ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams
253a2(nyi khri): drang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su
253a3(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin nyid ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam
253a4(nyi khri): du zad do// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon
253a5(nyi khri): med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs/ su med pa'i phyir/ yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// byang chub dmigs su
253a6(nyi khri): med pa'i phyir/ byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas shes bya ba 'di ni ming tsam du zad do// zhes bya bar
253a7(nyi khri): yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la'ang dag par gnas shes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA
253a8(nyi khri): ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par
253b1(nyi khri): byas shing / sems can yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba'i tshul gang la gang 'os pa de dag gis/ sangs rgyas
253b2(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das la rim gror bya ba dang / bkur stir bya ba dang / bsti stang du bya ba dang / mchod pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// 
253b3(nyi khri): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to// de byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de la gnas te/ sangs/ 
253b4(nyi khri): rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing / sang das rgyas zhing yongs su dag par byed de/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang / de la sangs rgyas
253b5(nyi khri): kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sangs rgyas kyi 'dra/ shes kyang mi 'byung ngo // de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas
253b6(nyi khri): shing / lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthus yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yongs su 'dzin to// de nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
253b7(nyi khri): kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi bar du/ theg pa de dang nam du yang mi 'bral te/ des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
253b8(nyi khri): thams cad dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma
254a1(nyi khri): yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro// de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
254a2(nyi khri): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dgra na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon
254a3(nyi khri): tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thag pa chen po/ bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog
254a4(nyi khri): la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig// rna ba zad mkhyen pa nyid po ste/ rnamadab khyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do// zhes grags pa sgrog cing // dbyangs
254a5(nyi khri): su brjod pa mdzad do// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs ri
254a6(nyi khri): zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gri bye ma snyed dgra na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzad cing / 'jig rten gyi khams che ge/ 
254a7(nyi khri): mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la gnas pa 'di zhes bya ba zhig/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob/ 
254a8(nyi khri): ste rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grag pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do// de ltar na tshe dang ldan pa shA radwa
254b1(nyi khri): ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
254b2(nyi khri): ldan 'das go che chen po bgos so// gom chen po bkres so zhes bgyin / bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go mchen po bgos
254b3(nyi khri): shes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
254b4(nyi khri): chen po theg pa chen de'i go cha chen po gyon cing 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ tshul khrim sa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
254b5(nyi khri): dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam ga/ na~M gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ na stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ 
254b6(nyi khri): phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag
254b7(nyi khri): par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam gyi go cha bgos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / bsam gtan dang / tshang
254b8(nyi khri): med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa
255a1(nyi khri): ra smyon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi spyo nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu/ 
255a2(nyi khri): dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
255a3(nyi khri): pa nyid kyi go cha dgos sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang bas brgyas par bkang ste/ shar
255a4(nyi khri): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / 
255a5(nyi khri): byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi/ phyogs re re zhing 'jog rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye
255a6(nyi khri): ma snyed snang bas rgyas par 'gengs so// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu spyod de/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang
255a7(nyi khri): ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu rab tu bskyod do// lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang // shar lho dang / lho nub dang / 
255a8(nyi khri): nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu bskyod do// des stong gsum gyi steng chen
255b1(nyi khri): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'din/ sems can dmyal ba'i ma'i phung po ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad med par byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
255b2(nyi khri): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do// dbyangs sgrog go/ de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag kyang / sangs rgyas
255b3(nyi khri): kyi sgra de thos nas/ dga' ba dang / bde ba 'theb sa/ de dag dga' ba dang / bde ba des sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo // de dag sems
255b4(nyi khri): can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang
255b5(nyi khri): de dag du skye'o// de bzhin du byol song gi skye gan sa pa'i sems can rnams dang / gshin rje 'jig rten pa'i sems can de dag rnam par ldang ngo // de
255b6(nyi khri): dag byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dgra nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs
255b7(nyi khri): shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po
255b8(nyi khri): che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag
256a1(nyi khri): cig mngon par sprul te/ de ltar mngon par sprul nas/ ngan song gi sems can de dag la/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi
256a2(nyi khri): sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrog par gyur te/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra des sems can dmyal ba dang / 
256a3(nyi khri): byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang / sgyu ma'i mkhan
256a4(nyi khri): po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang sems can dmyal ba dang / dkyi song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rte/ na de nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/ gsol
256a5(nyi khri): pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ phyogs
256a6(nyi khri): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su dkrol yang / sems can gang yang yongs su grol bar bya ba med
256a7(nyi khri): do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
256a8(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ sprin
256b1(nyi khri): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / song gsum gyi sto chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams n+d+har+yA m+b+ha las zung ba ngon par sprul pa byed do// de lta ben rgyu las drung
256b2(nyi khri): mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul pa byed do// de ltar 'khor los bsgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod po rnams la zas sbyin
256b3(nyi khri): ba byed do// skom 'dod pa rnams la skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams la gos/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la me tog/ phreng ba 'dod
256b4(nyi khri): rnams la byeng ba/ spos 'dod pa rnams la spos/ thug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa/ mal cha'/ dad pa rnams la mal cha/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim/ 
256b5(nyi khri): 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la yo byad/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang yo byada'adod pa rnams la rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do// nor
256b6(nyi khri): bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang dngul 'dod pa rnams la/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUr+ya dang / 
256b7(nyi khri): dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul gyi sbyin pa byed cing / mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin pa byed de/ des de ltar zas 'dod pa
256b8(nyi khri): rnams la zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid
257a1(nyi khri): kyi chos ston to// sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du/ pha rol
257a2(nyi khri): tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis// lam po che'i
257a3(nyi khri): bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshigs shig mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung
257a4(nyi khri): ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems// sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtsha dan bu des/ sems can gang la yang ci yang byin pa yod
257a5(nyi khri): dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
257a6(nyi khri): chen pos 'khor los bsgyur ba'i srid mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ me'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang / sems can gang la yang
257a7(nyi khri): ci'ang byin pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub
257a8(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/ 
257b1(nyi khri): ched du bas mas te skye ba yongs su 'jungs/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i tshigs su skye / de 'kho los sbyang ba'i dbyung drug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams/ 
257b2(nyi khri): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'god do// bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par
257b3(nyi khri): shes pa lnga dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
257b4(nyi khri): gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / ting nge 'dzin du dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gsheg/ 
257b5(nyi khri): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sems can rnams rab tu
257b6(nyi khri): 'god de/ sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du chos bstan pa de dang / nam yang
257b7(nyi khri): 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo/ 
257b8(nyi khri): mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i chog shig mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi sa 'dres pa
258a1(nyi khri): brgyad kyi bar la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan du mkhas pa des/ sems can gang yang
258a2(nyi khri): dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa yod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das da ni ma mchis so// 
258a3(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can tshad med gangs med pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi
258a4(nyi khri): lam la rab tu bkod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres dpa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod kyang sems can gang ya dang de dag la bkod pa med do// rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
258a5(nyi khri): de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ga/ 
258a6(nyi khri): cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa/ bam po bco lnga pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
258a7(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar
258a8(nyi khri): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing rab tu 'god pa
258b1(nyi khri): yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ brgya la sems can thams cad bdag la rdo dang dbyug pas brdeg
258b2(nyi khri): cing mtshon gyis 'debs kyang / de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed par mi bya'o zhes go cha gyon cing / sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra la rab
258b3(nyi khri): tu 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu mo'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhon po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i gzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i
258b4(nyi khri): tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig ma dngon par sprul te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lta sbyar ba dang / rab tu 'god pa byas na/ rab 'byor de la
258b5(nyi khri): ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po de'i mtshan bu des/ sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol
258b6(nyi khri): pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can tshang
258b7(nyi khri): med grangs med pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i
258b8(nyi khri): chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// 
259a1(nyi khri): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad brtson 'grus
259a2(nyi khri): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing
259a3(nyi khri): sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
259a4(nyi khri): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i se dmas bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus dang/ sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par bskul
259a5(nyi khri): zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i ma chan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i gzhi
259a6(nyi khri): mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du
259a7(nyi khri): sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des/ sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol po bcom ldan 'das
259a8(nyi khri): de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa lus dang sems
259b1(nyi khri): kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung
259b2(nyi khri): na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor
259b3(nyi khri): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag
259b4(nyi khri): par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te
259b5(nyi khri): sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gzhogacing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byung
259b6(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi chos nyid la gnas shing / chos gang la 'khrug pa 'am/ 'khrug pa med par yang dag par rjes su mi
259b7(nyi khri): mthong na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang
259b8(nyi khri): dag par bskul zhing gzhog pa dang 'god pa byed de/ de ltar yang dag par bskul ba rnams kyang / nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
260a1(nyi khri): rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du/ nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di
260a2(nyi khri): lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pa'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bro mang po'i tshogs
260a3(nyi khri): kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems sgyu ma'i
260a4(nyi khri): mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des / sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yang du ma/ gsol pa
260a5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhi na du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ 
260a6(nyi khri): sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe
260a7(nyi khri): na rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byer de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
260a8(nyi khri): chen po ni go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems
260b1(nyi khri): can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
260b2(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing / sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag por bskul ba dang / gzhog cing 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la
260b3(nyi khri): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang yang skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byung
260b4(nyi khri): pa 'am/ tshu rol tam/ pha rol tu mi dmigs te/ rab 'byo/ dar de ltar ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che na po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin/ 
260b5(nyi khri): tede de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskur zhing ga/ zhog go 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu
260b6(nyi khri): ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ ska bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig/ 
260b7(nyi khri): mngon par te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskal te gzhog cing bkod na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am// sgyu ma'i
260b8(nyi khri): mkhan po'i mtshan bu des/ sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom
261a1(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha
261a2(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ 
261a3(nyi khri): chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byer gzhan
261a4(nyi khri): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go do cha chen po bgos shing / shar phyogs kyi 'ji dag rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu
261a5(nyi khri): song zhing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tuphyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi kham sa de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag
261a6(nyi khri): thams cad kyang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'ged do// ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
261a7(nyi khri): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'jig rten gyi
261a8(nyi khri): khams de dag na/ sems can ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'ged do// 'di lta ste pa
261b1(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston te/ sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas
261b2(nyi khri): kyi bar du/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// lho dang / nub dang / byang dang byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / 
261b3(nyi khri): steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu spong shing / ji ltar bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa dang / shes rab kyi
261b4(nyi khri): pha rol tu phyin pa'o bar la gnas pa de bzhin du/ 'ji dag rten gyi khamasri dag na sems can ji snyed cigayod pa de dag thams cad yin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
261b5(nyi khri): yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
261b6(nyi khri): dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul zhing gzhog go 'god do// 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di
261b7(nyi khri): nyid kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs ma rgyas bar du/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug
261b8(nyi khri): dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ 
262a1(nyi khri): skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la yang dag par bskul cing gzhag ste/ 
262a2(nyi khri): bkod par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des/ sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug
262a3(nyi khri): la yang dag par bskul cing gzhog ste bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
262a4(nyi khri): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen dpos/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dgang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang / lho dang / nub dang / 
262a5(nyi khri): byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi
262a6(nyi khri): bye ma snyed kyi sems can gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod kyang / sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir
262a7(nyi khri): zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
262a8(nyi khri): bo go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
262b1(nyi khri): ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par spyod cing sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed de/ bdag gis sems can de snyed cig ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// 
262b2(nyi khri): 'di skad cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
262b3(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// 'di skad cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can
262b4(nyi khri): 'di snyed cig ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdu ngan la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di skad cig ni/ 
262b5(nyi khri): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cag ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni/ 
262b6(nyi khri): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong
262b7(nyi khri): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dag bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di skad cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni/ rang byang chub la dgod par
262b8(nyi khri): bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// bdag gis sems can 'di snyed cig ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par
263a1(nyi khri): mi bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed pa'i go mi 'byed kyi/ de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis sems can grangs med chad med pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
263a2(nyi khri): byin pa la dgod par bya'o// bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
263a3(nyi khri): phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// phyi stong pa nyid la dgod par
263a4(nyi khri): bya'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// dngos dpe med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la
263a5(nyi khri): dgod par bya'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'o snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 
263a6(nyi khri): rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / 
263a7(nyi khri): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgra thams cad la dgod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa
263a8(nyi khri): bani dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi ches ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dged par bya'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o// lan
263b1(nyi khri): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la
263b2(nyi khri): dgod par bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i gzhi
263b3(nyi khri): mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ 'di snyam du bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa 'di dag pa
263b4(nyi khri): rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o// rnam pa thams cang mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par bya'o snyam du semadas bskyed par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems
263b5(nyi khri): sgyu ma'i mkhan pa'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mtshan bu des sems can gang yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par byas pa yod dam/ rnam pa thams cad
263b6(nyi khri): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgod par byas pa yod dam/ gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
263b7(nyi khri): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la dgrod par sems bskyod kyang
263b8(nyi khri): sems can gang gi don du yang sems bskyed pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab
264a1(nyi khri): 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom
264a2(nyi khri): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du/ go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par
264a3(nyi khri): bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo // tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par shes
264a4(nyi khri): pas stong ngo // mig mig gis stong ngo // de bzhin du rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid yid kyis stong ngo // gzugs gzugs kyis stong ngo // sgra dang / 
264a5(nyi khri): dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos chos kyis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa mig gi rnam par shes pas stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par
264a6(nyi khri): shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa yid kyi rnam par shes pas stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa mig gi 'dus te
264a7(nyi khri): reg pas stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te ga kyi su rtag yid kyi 'dus te reg pas stong ngo // mig go 'dus
264a8(nyi khri): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bad/ lce'i
264b1(nyi khri): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong ngo // 
264b2(nyi khri): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
264b3(nyi khri): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo
264b4(nyi khri): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong nyid kyis stong ngo // byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su ma cu rtsa bdun byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
264b5(nyi khri): gyis stong ngo // 'phags pa'i bden pa dang / tshad med pa dang / bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i sgo mas par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / 
264b6(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / ting nge
264b7(nyi khri): 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sangs rgyas
264b8(nyi khri): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ngo // bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong ngo // go cha chen po yang go cha chen pos stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das
265a1(nyi khri): rnam grangs des nu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha bgos par rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 
265a2(nyi khri): rab 'byor ji skad du smras pa bzhin te/ de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon
265a3(nyi khri): par ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gang gi don du/ go cha chen po bgos pa'o sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas so// 
265a4(nyi khri): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ rnam pa thamadas cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bgyis/ rnam par ma bgyis/ mngon par ma bgyis pa lags/ byang chub sems
265a5(nyi khri): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi don du/ go cha ba'o/ sa pa'i sems can de dag kyang / ci'i slad du ma bgyis/ rnam par ma bgyis/ mngon par ma bgyis pa lags/ 
265a6(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byed pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas so// byang
265a7(nyi khri): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gang gi don du go cha chen po dges pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
265a8(nyi khri): rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ 
265b1(nyi khri): mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor mig mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon
265b2(nyi khri): par mi byed do// rab 'byor gzugs mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// sgra dang dri dang / ro dang / reg dang / chos mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// 
265b3(nyi khri): rab 'byor mig gi rnam par shes pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus
265b4(nyi khri): kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor mig gi'i 'dus te reg pa mi byed/ rnam par mi byed// 
265b5(nyi khri): mngon par mi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi byed/ 
265b6(nyi khri): rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
265b7(nyi khri): tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
265b8(nyi khri): rkyen gyis tshor ba mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor bdag mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs
266a1(nyi khri): ro// rang 'byor sems can mabyed / rnam par mi byed/ man par mi byed de/ detsa phyi na/  sngon tshwam dmigs pa 'gyur ro// gso
266a2(nyi khri): dang skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed can dang / shed bdag dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed
266a3(nyi khri): dede ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rmi lam ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// 
266a4(nyi khri): sgyu ma dang / sgra brnyan dang / mig yor dang / gzugs pa rnyan dang / smig rgyu dang / sprul pa ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin
266a5(nyi khri): tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor sbyin pa'i pha ro// tu phyin pa ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi/ byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa
266a6(nyi khri): phyir ro// rab 'byor tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
266a7(nyi khri): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid mi byed/ rnam
266a8(nyi khri): par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed do// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngo shin du mi
266b1(nyi khri): dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni mo byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i bya
266b2(nyi khri): ro 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang / bsam gtan rnams dang / tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang // 
266b3(nyi khri): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge dzin
266b4(nyi khri): rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / de bzhin gshe gas pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi
266b5(nyi khri): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni mo byed rnam par mi byed mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi da migs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni mi byed/ 
266b6(nyi khri): rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mo byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi
266b7(nyi khri): dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings no ma byed/ rnam par mi byeng / mngon par mi byed do// 
266b8(nyi khri): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu ma dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor byang chub na mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i bya
267a1(nyi khri): rab 'byor rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi byed/ rnam par mi byed/ mngon par mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de shin tu mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor
267a2(nyi khri): rnam grangs des ni/ 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas par rig par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang gi
267a3(nyi khri): don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mngon par ma byas par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
267a4(nyi khri): ngo'o go cha chen po bgos pa ni/ go cha med pa'i go cha chen po bgos shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das pad ngag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ 
267a5(nyi khri): bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma btsongs ma grol ba'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
267a6(nyi khri): byams gang gi bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcangs ma grol ba yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / 
267a7(nyi khri): rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba yin nam/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 
267a8(nyi khri): 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar ma bcings ma grol ba'i gzugs gang yin/ de ltar ma bcings ma grol
267b1(nyi khri): pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa gang po gang 'di rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gang 'di
